title: FermiHDI HD Node successful response
description: The JSON Schema for a successful registration for a new node with a DMS

nodes.description: An array of nodes this host should run

id.description: The unique id of the node

cmdPort.description: The code port for the node

prodPort.description: The production port for the node

x509Certificate.description: A x.509 certificate for the node signed by the DMS with a FermiHDI HD signing key as the Root CA
